features: THE NEW GENERATION TALL PHONE TRIPOD STAND - S201 tall phone tripod: We've introduced a fresh solution to address ongoing concerns of our customers: 1. Blending professional photography tripod technology, ensuring exceptional stability even when fully extended to a towering 87 inches. Content creator essentials; 2. The high-hardness gooseneck at the top of the small phone tripod keeps the smartphone stable at any angle, minimizing shaking and preventing sagging. 3. This selfie tripod features simplified accessories, replacing bulky base support joints with toggle-style legs and weight hooks, thereby extending the product's lifespan.

WHY ACHIEVE HIGH STABILITY? - 1.The sturdy base is the foundation of stability. The central axis base of the tripod is made of engineering plastic and aluminum alloy, durable and resistant to damage. The angle adjustment joint offers three positions for quick deployment. The base legs are 17.4 in long and made of high-strength steel flex hose with a diameter of 0.79 in and a wall thickness of 0.67 in. This base provides extensive support and boasts exceptional weight-bearing capacity. 2.The bottom of the tripod stand features a hook, which, when weighted, significantly lowers the center of gravity of the tripod, ensuring minimal wobbling even at maximum height.

VERHEAD MOUNT AND EXTRA TALL SELFIE TRIPOD - 1.The cell phone tripod's broad base and long gooseneck enable the cellphone to deviate up to 16 inches from the center pole while maintaining excellent stability. This allows the phone to be positioned at challenging angles for overhead smartphone tripod stand, making it suitable for activities such as cooking, tabletop drawing, and showcasing desktop instructional videos. 2.The maximum height of the cellphone tripod is sufficient to meet almost all outdoor selfie scenarios, offering an overhead shooting perspective. The included remote controller allows you to conveniently take selfies.

KEY FEATURES OF THE STAND - 1.The top of the phone tripod features two control knobs, allowing for 180° tilt and 360° horizontal rotation of the phone, enabling it to be positioned at any angle. The tripod's connection point is equipped with a 1/4-inch screw head, allowing for the attachment of mirrorless cameras, GoPros, webcams, and other devices. 2.The tripod's footpads are made of high-resistance rubber, suitable for the majority of surfaces. 3.The phone clamp can hold phones up to 3.14 in wide. 4.The central pole is constructed from aluminum alloy tubing measuring 0.67 in in thickness, ensuring sufficient strength when fully extended, without easily wobbling.

LIGHTWEIGHT CAMERA SHOOTING TRIPOD STANDS - If the tripod removes the steel flexible tubing, it can be used as a camera stand. In this case, the stand's minimum shooting height is 19 inches. The S201 tripod is particularly suitable for lightweight cameras, such as Mirrorless cameras, Compact System Cameras (CSC), Interchangeable lens camera (ILC) and Mirrorless interchangeable-lens camera (MILC). Ensure the weight does not exceed 4.4 pounds(2kg).

BASIC PARAMETERS AND USAGE SCENARIOS - 1.[Basic Parameters] Selfie Height: 19-87 inches; Storage Size: 16.5 inches (including carrying bag); Weight 1.47 pounds; Compatible with all iPhone and android cell phone;2.[Usage Scenarios] This tripod is perfect for selfies, streaming video creation, and overhead teaching. It's great for landscape photography, live streaming, portrait photography, family gatherings, parties, and more. Its flexibility, stability, and lightweight nature make it ideal for sports event photography as well.

CUSTOMER SERVICE - We offer a 2-year after-sales . Within this period, any quality issues with the product can be promptly replaced. We provide corresponding accessories to ensure that lost parts can be purchased during use. Simply search "CAMBOFOTO S201" to find what you need.

features: KEY FEATURES - 1.Lightweight and Compat: This tall cell Phone tripod is made of lightweight aerospace aluminum alloy, weighing only 1.5 lbs. When folded, it measures just 16.5 inches, fitting easily into your backpack without adding extra weight. 2.Tall Enouth: When fully extended, the tripod can hold your phone at a height of 73 inches, fully meeting your everyday needs. 3.Horizontal Shooting: The center column can be extended and inserted into the horizontal conversion port, transforming it into an overhead shooting tripod. You can mount your phone 13.8 inches from the central axis of the tripod.

SIMPLE AND FLEXIBLE HEAD - This is a simple cell phone tripod with a 1/4-inch screw on the tripod head, allowing you to attach the included rotating phone holder, a compact camera, a mirrorless camera, or a GoPro. The tripod is very lightweight, making it ideal for filming, vlogging, live streaming, and video recording during outdoor travel. The tripod head has three joints, each controlling different functions: 360° horizontal rotation, 180° tilt adjustment, and switching between landscape and portrait modes for the phone.

VERY PRACTICAL FEATURES - 1. The phone tripod is manufactured using rapid cooling injection molding, featuring engineering plastic and aluminum alloy. Its components are precise, and the head rotates smoothly, providing an excellent user experience. 2. The tripod head includes 2 bubble levels to assist in keeping your phone in perfect horizontal and vertical shooting positions. 3. We provide you with a remote control, allowing convenient remote operation of your phone's camera shutter for easy selfies. 4. The center column can be used as a selfie stick, with a total length of 17.7 inches.

OFF-AXIS OVERHEAD SHOOTING FUNCTION - This lightweight cellphone tripod provides a stable shooting position at a height of 55 inches off the ground. When fully extended, you can extend your phone up to 17.7 inches away from the tripod's central axis while maintaining stability. From this shooting angle, you can freely capture various tabletop instructional videos such as cooking, painting, and crafts.

IMPORTANT REMINDER - This tripod was designed with certain trade-offs in mind, so please note the following: 1.This tripod is designed for phones, supporting up to 2.5 lbs, suitable for all phones, GoPros, compact cameras, and most mirrorless cameras. Please avoid using devices heavier than this limit. 2. When the tripod cannot fully extend in overhead shooting mode, the support surface may not stabilize the horizontal bar enough to prevent tipping. In such situations, if your phone is positioned at its maximum off-axis distance, you'll need to attach a counterweight to the opposite end of the horizontal bar to maintain balance.

BASIC PARAMETERS - Name: iPhone Tripod, Smartphone Tripod, Mirrorless Camera/Compact Camera Tripod. Compatible with all phones with a width of 1.96~3.3 inches; Tripod legs fully extended height: 73 inches; Tripod legs fully extended with center column retracted height: 60 inches; Height of phone in overhead mode: 60 inches; Minimum support height: 17.7 inches; Independent center column length (can be used as a selfie stick) : 17.7 inches; Tripod weight: 1.5 lbs

AFTER-SALES - Within two years, any quality issues with the product can be promptly replaced. We provide corresponding accessories to ensure that lost parts can be purchased during use. Simply search "CAMBOFOTO 205C" to find what you need.

Introduction to using tripod 
PTZ pitch adjustment

PTZ horizontal rotation adjustment

Horizontal / vertical shooting

Central axis lift

aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Aluminum, Professional, Heavy Duty, Stable, Lightweight, Portable, Non-Skid Tripod Feet, Quick Flip Locks 
JOILCAN 74 Inches Tripod brings you our professional portfolio of all-in-one shoots to take your shoots to the next level. The camera tripod offers superb stability on different terrains and gives you excellent, smooth results when employing pans and tilts during stills or video recording, including portrait shots, panoramic landscape shots, and more. 
Tripod for Camera 
Most video cameras, digital cameras, still cameras, projectors, ring lights, camcorders, and scopes with 1/4” screw thread, compatible with Nikon D3500/D7500, Canon m50 EOS rebel t6 t7, Olympus, Panasonic. 
Tripod for Phone 
Adjustable universal phone mount Extends from 3.3-inch to 5.2-inch, compatible with iPhone 14 13 12 11 Pro/XS/XR/MAX/8/8 Plus/X/7 Plus/7/6s Plus/6s/6 Plus/6, Samsung Galaxy S10 Plus /S10/S8 Plus /S8 /S9 Plus /S9 /Note 8, and most other smartphones. 
All-in-1 Versatile Tripod 
This video tripod is suitable for photography, YouTube, Vlog, video conferencing, online meetings, live streaming, recording games, watching Volleyball tournaments, recording yoga videos, and outside with wind for traveling recording, making meals, recording moments of daily life or anytime when you need. 
Fast 3D Plate with 1/4 Screw 
This tripod for the camera attached a quick 3D plate with 1/4 Screw, which makes it easier for the photographer to operate. you can fix the camera /projector /fish light or other device matched 1/4 Screw easily. 
Weight Hook 
Hanging heavy items backpack or sandbag onto the built-in weight hook for increase extra stability and bearing capacity when working in outdoor windy environments. The Knob can be adjusted and fixed. 
Center Column Adjustment 
Clockwise rotate the center column knob firstly, and then through the swing-type bottom bracket lifting device, the gear rotates to adjust to the desired height. Get a higher shooting view. 
Quick Flip Locks & Non-Slip Foot 
You can adjust this travel tripod height with 4 quick leg locks. 
The flips-locks system makes it easier and faster to adjust the height, so you can extend or retract the tripod in seconds. 
Makes for easy transportation of the tripod, you can take it with you around

1.How to choose the height of the tripod? 
Choose a tripod that is suitable for your height. Tripod height=your height-15cm-camera height. If you have additional requirements, you can choose according to the actual situation. 
2.What is the difference between carbon fiber tripod and aluminum tripod? 
For the same size tripod,carbon fiber will weigh about 30% less than aluminum alloy, and its strength will be higher, and it will not rust. But the value is also higher. 
3.How to choose the tripod loading capacity? 
You can choose according to the weight of camera and lens, for example your equipment is 2kg, it is suggested to choose the tripod bearing above 4kg. 
4.What is the difference between the twist lock and the lever lock? 
The structure of the twist lock is simple, easy to replace parts, disassemble, clean and maintain. The lever lock opens faster and is easy to operate with one hand. 
Can other gimbal be installed? 
Yes, any gimbal with a 3/8-inch port on the bottom is compatible.

title: 71" Phone Tripod & Selfie Stick, All in One Extendable Cell Phone Tripod with Wireless Remote, Tripod Stand for iPhone & Travel Tripod 360° Rotation Compatible with iPhone Android Phone, Camera
breadCrumbs: Cell Phones & Accessories › Accessories › Photo & Video Accessories › Tripods
features: ✅【Versatile 71'' Phone Tripod】: SelfieShow's updated tripod combines the function of phone stand with a selfie stick. Effortlessly extends, A precision-crafted extension rod extends smoothly and uniformly, With a simple "Pull" the tripod iphone stand can be transformed into a long selfie stick, It glides to 70.86 inches tall tripod in less than a second. Perfect for taking selfies, Photographers, Youtube, vlogging, live streaming and Family Gathering.

✅【Extra Tall 71" Adjustable Tripod】: With 8-section adjustable telescopic poles, the phone selfie stick tripod stand is tall enough, can be adjusted from 13.11in(33.3cm) to 70.86in(180cm). Therefore, this selfie stick for iPhone can capture a wider landscape and meet the needs of people who want to have different shoot heights and apply it in different scenes, even for the tall man. Suitable for selfies, vlog, live streaming, group photos and more.

✅【360° Rotatable & Detachable Remote】: The mount of the tripod stand can freely rotate 360°, which can be quickly ratoted the screen horizontally and vertically , and the mount arm can be 255°flipped to shoot pictures at various angles. Wireless remote can be instantly paired with a phone to take multiple photos within 10m,and it has a detachable design and can be placed in the groove of the travel tripod for easy storage when not in use.

✅【Lightweight and Portable】: The SelfieShow selfie stick phone tripod is designed with portability in mind. With a folded length of only 13 inch(33.3cm) and a weight of 0.86 Ib(393g), it's incredibly lightweight and easy to carry around. You can easily pack it in your backpack and take it with you wherever you go, making it the perfect travel companion. Its compact size also makes it ideal for outdoor activities such as hiking, camping, or cycling, as it won't weigh you down.

✅【Wide Compatibility】: The universal phone holder is compatible with all cellphone between 6.5cm to 10cm. With a universal 1/4" screw mount is applicable for most digital cameras, action camera, webcam and camcorder. Tripod mount for iPhone is suitable for almost all the smartphones, fits for iPhone 14 13 12 11 pro max, Samsung Galaxy S10 / S9 / S8, Huawei P40 / P30 / Mate 40 / Mate 30 and more.

【Heavy Duty & Stability】 Superior-quality aluminum structure and twin-tube design support the max loading of 17.6lbs. 3 sections tripod legs with mid-level spreader can extend from 29.5" to 70.8" using without instability.

title: NEEWER 74" Video Tripod with Fluid Head, QR Plate , Aluminum Heavy Duty Camera Tripod Professional for DSLR Cameras Camcorders, Max Load 17.6lb/8kg, TP74
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Tripods & Monopods › Complete Tripods
features: 【Versatile Heavy Duty Video Tripod】 TP74 tripod stabilizes a camera or camcorder to take photos and videos of sports, weddings, landscapes, and products. Double tandem aluminum alloy legs provide reliable stability with a max load capacity of 17.6lb/8kg. The mid level spreader and nonslip rubber feet for further stability

【Premium Fluid Drag Pan Head】 TP74 Tripod features a fluid drag pan head with a smooth friction damping and balancing system. Supports 360° rotation and -75°/+90° tilt movement. The ø3" (75mm) bowl base with 360° scale for panoramic sharp images with fluidity. A handy bubble level helps to keep the level straight all the time. The telescopic handle is easy to use and store

【Height Adjustment from 35" to 74" 】 3 section telescopic legs and flip locks enable this shooting tripod to extend from 34" to 74" (86cm to 187cm). The photography tripod can be folded to 36"/91cm and fit in the carrying bag for easy storage and transportation. Adjust the tension of the flip locks with the L shaped hex keys

【Universal Mounting Threads】 The 1/4" & 3/8" screws on the top of the fluid head make it compatible with Sony Canon Nikon and other DSLR cameras, mirrorless cameras, camcorders, and telescopes. The 1/4" threaded hole for external devices such as magic arms, monitors, cell phones, microphones, video lights, etc.

title: 75" Camera Tripod for Cell Phone, Travel Tripod for Camera with Wireless Remote, Heavy Duty Camera Stand Tripod for DSLR/SLR/DV/GoPro (Black)
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Tripods & Monopods › Complete Tripods
features: 【Portable and Simple to Adjust】Our professional camera tripod is a must-have and go-to for photographers. It adjusts swiftly from 19 to 75 inches, folds down to a compact 20 inches at 3.15 lbs, and comes with a travel bag for easy carrying. With a quick setup and a lightweight design, it's perfect for on-the-go photographers seeking both convenience and professional stability.

【Professional 3 Way Pan Head】Elevate your photography with our camera tripods featuring a professional ergonomic 3 way pan head for 360°rotation. Perfect for vertical, horizontal, and overhead shots, these tripods ensure superb stability and smooth results in both photo and video recording. Experience precision and professionalism with every use.

【Tripod for All Camera and Phone】With standard 1/4" screw mount, our versatile tripod is perfect for all cameras, including DSLRs and compacts, such as Nikon, Canon, Fujifilm, and more. It's also compatible with various phones, featuring a 360° mount for iPhones and Androids from 2.2" to 7.5", even for iPad Air, and more. With added quick release plates and a wireless remote, capturing stunning photos and videos is a breeze.

【High-Quality Sturdy Tripod】Our top-notch heavy duty tripod guarantees durability and stability on any terrain, ensuring your shots are perfectly aligned without any shakes. Crafted from high-grade aluminum alloy and ABS resin, it's both rugged and reliable. The non-slip rubber feet, sponge pads, and stability hook provide a solid grip and extra support. It adapts to challenging environments, enhancing the clarity of your equipment's imaging.

【Widely Application】This robust 75" dslr tripod is your go-to for a wide range of activities, indoors and outdoors. Perfect for events, selfies, family photos, parties, travel, sports, YouTube, Vlogging, live streaming, and more. With a versatile 3-position leg adjustment system, whether you're into photography, food shoots, live streaming, or capturing stunning scenery and portraits, this tripod has you covered.

features: Extendable Tripods： Extends from 20 to 60 inches with 5-section aluminum alloy telescopic rod, this camera tripod fully adapts to a range of different heights with the locking-pad locked, and enables you to create your own unique height and view while taking a picture or video. Versatile Tripod： Equipped with a standard 1/4 screw and a detachable phone mount, the tripods would work with all 4''-7'' cell phones and DSLR/SLR Cameras, projectors, webcams, ring lights, monitors, etc. Note: The phone and camera tripod is not designed for the tablet.

Multiple Shooting Angles： With a 3-way pan head, the cell phone tripod supports 360° rotation in the horizontal and vertical directions, which creates various angles and heights for you to pick up while taking panoramic photos/videos/live-streaming. The 17 inches folded size is easy to put into your carry bag especially for traveling.

Detachable Remote： After fast pairing without password, you can take photos or record videos freely within 10 meters with the remote control. With only 20 minutes of full charging, the remote supports 20 hours of continuous working. Which makes distance and height are no more limitations for your picture or video. And a special remote control slot on the tripod legs is designed for you to store the shutter.

Sturdy Camera Tripod： Made of high-quality aluminum alloy and PP, this tripod stand is sturdy enough to support heavy smartphones, projectors, and cameras. The reinforced triangular structure makes the tripod stand more stable and more resistant to wind while outdoors shooting. Thanks to the handle, tighten the screw, and swivel of the tripod， the phone and camera tripod is perfect for panoramic shots without shaking.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Versatile Phone/Camera/Projector 60 inches Tripod with Chargeable Remote 
It’s a versatile tripod designed for live streaming, video recording, wedding, vlogging, photography, ect. This compact and portable tripod for cell phone can meet the needs of photography enthusiasts and provide more possibilities to explore! 
3-way Pan Head & Multiple Adjustable Angles 
The design of the 3-way pan head supports unlimited shooting with a tripod phone mount. Horizontal, vertical, oblique, and overhead shooting can be quickly switched, which is easy to operate and allows you to shoot panoramic photos/videos without limitations. 
Stable Triangular Structure 
The middle of the three legs is connected by the buckle of the triangular structure, which is more stable and secure. In addition, the three legs can be folded for saving space. After the buckle being locked, the tripod can be turned into a "monopod", which is very flexible and portable. 
1/4 Screw & Widely Compatible 
The standard 1/4'' Screw of the camera tripod stand is compatible with multiple devices. Including fill light, ring light, dslr camera, small camera, projector, webcam, monitor, phone clip, etc, you can free switch to your device while there is a need. Our camera tripod is compatible with Nikon D3500/Fuji X-T200, Canon EOS 250D/Olympus/Panasonic/mobile phone/projector/network camera. 
Sturdy Aluminum Design 
The phone tripod with remote is made of sturdy aluminum, which is sturdy and anti-corrosion, and it has good stability even in harsh environments, very suitable for outdoor shooting, wedding vlogs, camping use. 
Quick-release Flip locks 
The flips-locks of this tripod for camera can adjust the height easily, you can extend or retract the camera stand tripod in seconds.In addition, non-slip rubber feet ensures the lightweight tripod is more stable, you don’t need to worry about tilting. 
Universal Phone Tripod Holder 
The phone holder can be extended from 2.2in-4.1in, which is suitable for all 4-7in phone with a standard case. Besides, it is equipped with rubber anti-slip pads that can prevent your phone from falling or shaking while in use. 
Extendable Center Column 
The center column of the projector tripod stand can be extended up to 24cm when fully extended, sturdy to hold your devices. There has a remote card slot on the leg of the cellphone tripod, which can prevent the remote from being lost. 
Note: 
●The weight of the Tripod body is 1.76lb, the folded size is 17.5*3.5*3.5 inches, the maximum height of tripod body is 55.5 inches, and the maximum height including the phone mount is 60 inches. 
●The remote control supports mobile phones but does not support cameras.If the remote control does not work, you can always send an email to inquire about the solution to the settings. 
●The camera tripod does not have a leveling bubble. When the three legs are opened and stretched to the same height, they will maintain balance when placed on a level ground. 
●This model does not include a quick-release plate.

title: SmallRig CT-20 Camera Tripod, 78.7" Foldable Aluminum Tripod & Monopod, 360°Ball Head Detachable and Quick Release Plate, Payload 33lb, Adjustable Height from 18.5" to 78.7" for Camera, Phone - 3474C
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Tripods & Monopods › Complete Tripods
features: COMPATIBILITY: This tripod camera is universally compatible with all cameras and equipment with 1/4"-20 and 3/8"-16 threaded holes, such as DSLR cameras, sports cameras, and mirrorless cameras. It can also be used with mobile phones and projectors. Note: For cameras with a telephoto zoom lens, you will need to purchase a tripod mount ring or telephoto lens bracket for better balance.

2-IN-1 TRIPOD & MONOPOD: The aluminium tripod can be easily transformed into a monopod or walking stick, making it an ideal companion for hiking or travelling. The central pole can be inverted to allow for low-angle shooting and macro photography. The 4-section column legs with 3 quick-release flip-locks allow you to adjust the working height from 18.5" to 78.7" in seconds. The folded size 17.3" makes it easy to take anywhere for outdoor photography.

36MM BALL-HEAD: Compared to other ball heads with a diameter of less than 36mm (for example, 28mm,22mm), a 36mm head can provide better stability. The specially designed 36mm metal ball head can rotate 360°, allowing you to take photos at any angle horizontally and vertically. Additionally, the ball head of the tripod is detachable, thanks to the double-headed screw design on the top of the tripod, making the panoramic tripod compatible with 1/4"-20 and threaded holes ball head or fluid head.

33LBS MAX LOAD: The DSLR tripod offers a high level of stability using a high-quality magnesium aluminum alloy. It can withstand up to 33 lbs (15 kg). You can focus on composition and be ready for your photo or video without worrying that your hand may be shaky. The weight of the tripod is 3.88 lbs, and the lightweight tripod comes with a carry bag, so you can easily take it anywhere you want to go.

INNOVATION and PACKAGE INCLUDES: Different from other tripods, this tripod has three 1/4" threaded holes added to the bracket, which can meet the needs of external magic arms, mobile phones, monitors, etc. Package Include : Tripod*1, Smartphone Holder*1, Carry Bag*1, Alen Wrench*3, Maunual*1, Stainless Steel Foot Screw*3, Quick release plate*2（one is equipped on tripod, another is in carry bag).

Multi-angle shooting - The removable center column feature allows extreme low-angle and macro shooting. When the center column is attached to the tripod, turn the column lock to adjust the column for additional working heights.

Easy to Carry - Lightweight but durable, the portable tripod legs can be inverted and folded back 180 degrees, saving length to 12.4" compact storage size, also comes with a portable bag, which is easy to carry and pack for travel.

title: SIRUI Carbon Fiber Tripod Lightweight 2lbs with Panoramic Fluid Head, 59.8” Compact Camera Tripod Quick Release Leg Setup, Reversible Center Column, Reverse Folding Legs, Max Load 11lbs - Traveler X
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Tripods & Monopods › Complete Tripods
features: 3K CARBON FIBER MATERIAL- Crafted with 3K twill weave patterns, the SIRUI Traveler X carbon fiber tripod kit is remarkably lightweight while remaining extraordinary stability, making it a perfect go-to tripod for traveling or backpacking.

INNOVATIVE & QUICK REALEASE LEG - Instead of using several twist locks to adjust the height, the SIRUI tripod uses only one twist lock to fully extend or retract the 5-section leg tubes within 2 seconds, save more time to catch the shooting or hunting moment.

2.09 LIGHTWEIGHT, 11 LOAD - The tripod for camera kit weighs only 2.09lbs! An ultra lightweight travel tripod for carrying around than others so much. It comes with reverse-folding carbon fiber tripod legs and a compact folded size.
FLUID HEAD - The AT-10 two-way video head with an attached handle provides smooth and vibrant-free pan (360 degree) and tilt(±90 degree) movement while filming.
TWO SECTION REVERSIBLE CENTER COLUMN - The center column is reversible for low-angle and macro shots. It's great to get a short column section for ground shots while twisted off the upper part.

ANTI TWIST PINS - The QR (quick release) Arca swiss plate comes with anti-twist pins to lock the camera securely in place, eliminating the possibility of the camera swiveling while filming, shooting, and photography. (Due to variations in specifications of ARCA-type quick release plates from different manufacturers, we recommend using the plates included in our kits for optimal compatibility.)

1/4" SCREW PORT - Various accessories can be attached to the tripod via a 1/4" Screw hole to realize unlimited shooting possibility from camera, light, smartphone and so on. Best gift idea for a man or female who works professionally in long exposure, light painting, macro photography, low-light photography, videography, powerful portraiture, vlogging and more!
UPGREADE RING PULL - The video ball head comes with a ring pull to allow you to easily tighten the screw between the QR plate and the camera. Less is more!
STABILIZING HOOK - A hook is included, hanging the bag from the bottom of the column will add stability, keep your stuff clean.
6 YEARS GUARTEE - SIRUI Traveler X Tripod for camera, AT-10 Two Way Video Head, Travel Bag, 4mm Allen Wrench, 3mm Allen Wrench.

title: Selfie Stick Tripod,67 inches Long Extendable Selfie Stick Tripod, Phone Tripod with Wireless Remote Shutter,Group Selfies/Live Streaming/Video Recording Compatible with All Cellphones (67 inch)
breadCrumbs: Cell Phones & Accessories › Accessories › Photo & Video Accessories › Selfie Sticks
features: 【All in 1 Selfie Stick Tripod】: This is a nifty piece of kit, not only a selfie stick but can also be converted very easily into a phone stand, At the bottom end, you can release the three legs to get a tabletop tripod. In normal conditions on a flat surface, The shorter it is extended, the more stable it will be. A nice steady balanced tripod,Perfect for taking selfies, Photographers, Youtube, vlogging, live streaming and Family Gathering.

【Adjustable Phone Holder and Rotation Angle】The Phone clips to hold your phone are simple enough, you unfold the two little pads and extend the sprung end of the clip to hold your phone, very sturdy and grips your phone nice and tight.275° vertical rotation, suitable for a variety of angles ，360° rotation head allows you to find your favourite shooting angle by simply rotating the knob to meet different needs better.

【Lightweight and Portable】: The selfie stick phone tripod is designed with portability in mind. With a folded length of only 11.8 inch(30cm) and a weight of 0.69 Ib(315g), But also can extend a long way (to 70 inches including the handle),it's incredibly lightweight and easy to carry around. You can easily pack it in your backpack and take it with you wherever you go, making it the perfect travel companion. Its compact size also makes it ideal for outdoor activities such as hiking, camping, or cycling, as it won't weigh you down.

【Capturing the Beauty of Moment with Ease】: Featuring an embedded anti-loss remote design, this selfie stick can be effortlessly changed, whether held in hand or used for remote photography. It offers a remarkable Bluetooth range of up to 10 meters, allowing you to take photos from a distance. When a remote controller is not required, simply toggle the switch to conserve energy effectively, extending the battery life (Provide lifetime remote control replacement service).

【Wide Compatibility】: The universal phone holder is compatible with all cellphone between 6.5cm to 10cm.Tripod mount for iPhone is suitable for almost all the smartphones, fits for iPhone 15 14 13 12 pro max, Samsung Galaxy S10 / S9 / S8, Huawei P70 / P60 / Mate 60 / Mate 40 and more.

features: Sturdy & Portable -- Heavy duty aluminum and 2lbs weighted tripod base are combined to construct this stable and sturdy phone tripod stand. title: 82" /210cm Video Tripod Heavy Duty Tripod with 360° Fluid Head,Mactrem Aluminum Tall Tripods Professional Compatible with Canon Nikon Sony DSLR Camera Camcorder Telescope Bnoculars (Load 33Lb)
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Tripods & Monopods › Complete Tripods
features: 【Professional Fluid Head】Thevideo tripod with fluid head is cast by a magnesium-aluminum alloy, which is incredibly sturdy yet lightweight. The 82 Inch video tripod weighs 9.8 pounds (4.45 kg) and supports 33 pounds (15 kg). The fluid head provides a safe and stable platform for cameras DSLR. It is ideal for large cameras and professional camcorders

【The Three-Dimensional Head】 The heavy duty tripod features a pre-set counterbalance with a fair amount of spring-loaded tension. The head has three drag adjusters, which can control the head flexibly: 1. The fluid head can rotate 360° horizontally. 2. The head can tilt up and down +90° / -70°. After releasing the pan axis, the hydraulic device in the head will spring back to level. 3. The head can adjust the angle or level at will within the sphere of +10° / -10° hydraulic

【The pans and tilts are smooth as silk】 The components that make up the fluid head are firm and precisely connected. They are separated by damping oil to ensure very smooth pans and tilts. You will have a good experience while using travel tripod

【Universal QR Plate and the Pan Axis】 Quick-release plates come with a 1/4"-20 screw, and a 3/8"-16 screw toured in a thread under the plate, offering a sliding range of +30/-30mm . The video tripod with a standard thread suitable for most DSLR rigs, compact camcorders, and digital cinema cameras. The pan axis can be installed on the left or right side according to your needs

【Package Includes】1 x heavy-duty fluid head tripod，1 x carrying bag, 1 x 3/8"-16 screw,1 x user manual.If you have any questions or requests, please feel free to contact us. The after-sale service team will reply to you within 24 hours

features: 【Dual-Mode Quick-Release Plate Mount】The fluid head is compatible with two modes of quick-release plates - Mode for DJI RS 2/RS3/RS3 PRO,. This dual-mode mount design allows you to switch between the two quick-release plate.

【Stable and Adjustable Tripod】Professional heavy duty aluminum double-tube tripod with built-in bubble level, high-strength aluminum alloy double-row tubes and 75mm bowl bottom, which can provide better stability for the video tripod. The adjustable height of the travel tripod is: 85-186cm/33-73in, and the maximum load is: 8KG/17LBS.

【Professional Fluid Head】Built-in damping and balancing system enable 360° horizontal and +90°/-60° vertical movements.The camera fluid head adopts side-pressed quick release, which can be unlocked by pushing the side button to realize the quick disassembly and installation of the camera.

【Portability and Storage Convenience】Featuring a spacious carrying handle on the tripod and an anti-slip design, this professional tripod ensures easy portability and comfortable transitions. Additionally, the quick release plate features a built-in wrench for convenient use. For easy storage, the tripod comes with a handbag equipped storage option.
【Package Includes】1 x heavy-duty fluid head tripod，1 x carrying bag, 1 x 1/4''-20 screw, 1 x 3/8"-16 screw,1 x user manual.

title: Manfrotto Befree 3-Way Live Advanced 4-Section Tripod with Befree 3-Way Live Head
inStockText: This item cannot be shipped to your selected delivery location. Please choose a different delivery location.      This item cannot be shipped to your selected delivery location. Please choose a different delivery location.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Tripods & Monopods › Complete Tripods
description: The Befree 3-Way Live Advanced is an innovative model joining the Manfrotto’s flagship tripod family, Befree Advanced, for travel photography and videography, specifically developed for hobbyist and amateur photographers and videographers who want maximum performance and versatility in an all-in-one compact support. The Befree 3-Way Live Advanced is the first travel tripod kit on the market developed for both photo and video applications. The kit consists of the brand-new Manfrotto’s Befree 3-way Live Head kitted out with the successful Befree Advanced aluminium tripod. It fulfils the need of a dual-purpose photo/video camera kit which see new cameras combining high-quality photo performances with a full-frame sensor and 4K video recording and the complementarity of these two worlds in daily use. The Manfrotto’s Befree 3-way Live Head, the innovative Manfrotto’s travel 3-way fluid head, features fully foldable handles for unparalleled compactness, and remarkable sturdiness, carrying a payload of up to 13.23lbs. This pioneering head perfectly meets the customer need of experiencing video and photo applications with only one ultra-versatile support. The head also features the unique 200PL-PRO plate, made of a high-quality aluminium body and fully compatible with Manfrotto RC2 & Arca-Swiss type head attachments: with 2 rubber inserts that maximise grip, even on the most angled shots. Moreover, the head's plate-holder is also compatible with 501PL video plate, to ensure the perfect balance even with longer lenses.
features: Befree 3-Way Live Advanced Tripod - Befree 3-Way Live Head - 200PL-PRO Plate - Befree Carry Bag - Manfrotto 10 Year Limited Warranty (2 Year + 8 Years Extension with Online Registration)
High-performance photo/video kit in an ultracompact size
Sturdy fully foldable 3-Way Fluid Head with 6kg payload
Fluid Drag System both on panoramic and tilt movements
Compatible with Arca-swiss and Manfrotto 501PL video plate

Can the head included in the kit be replaced with another head? 
Yes, Befree can be paired with any head with a standard thread 3/8″ screw. However, only the Befree series heads will allow the legs to fold up around it properly. All Befree heads can be conveniently stored in the provided carrying bag. 
How does this kit enhance shooting precision? 
It's ideal for those who want accurately framed photos and smooth videos through features such as Fluid Drag Sytem, long pan handle, portrait position. It's the first ever foldable fluid 3-Way travel head making it compact enough to bring anywhere. 
How can I level my system to get the perfect horizontal position? 
This kit does not include a leveling system. To level your camera, you should open the locks on each of the three legs and find the perfectly level position before locking them again. 
What does dual compatible head mean? 
The Befree 3-Way head works with both photo and video plates. It comes with 200PL-PRO and the mount is compatible with also sliding 501PL and Arca-Swiss. 
What does the Safety Payload UNI/PdR 105:2021 mean? 
The UNI/PdR is a new reference practice for payload measurement to provide full transparency about payload measurements to consumers. The safety payload declaration has been tested to ensure performance. Please check website for more information.

title: ATUMTEK Selfie Stick Tripod, Extendable 3 in 1 Aluminum Bluetooth Selfie Stick with Wireless Remote and Tripod Stand for iPhone 16/15/14/13/12/11 Pro Max/XS Max/XS/XR/X/8/7, Samsung Smartphones White
breadCrumbs: Cell Phones & Accessories › Accessories › Photo & Video Accessories › Selfie Sticks
features: ⭐ [Integrated Innovation Design] - The ATUMTEK Selfie Stick and tripod stand integrating together, combined with premium aluminium extendable stick, the selfie stick is extremely stable. The extendable pole is constructed with aviation-grade aluminum alloy with surface anodic oxidation process for which it will be sturdy and durable.

⭐ [Adjustable Angle & Rotable Phone Holder] - The ATUMTEK Bluetooth Selfie Stick adopts a 270 degree rotatable phone holder design, which supports mobile phone horizontal clips and vertical clamps. The 180 degree enables you to select perfect angle when you take photos. The phone holder supports devices of which the width up to 3.42 inch.

⭐ [Detatchable Bluetooth Remote & Awesome Battery Life] - The Bluetooth control distance is up to 33ft, which allows you to take photos by yourself or take group photos by taking off the remote controller. With built-in 50mAh rechargeable and recycling Lithium battery, you can continuously capture 15000 photos after fully charge via USB charging port 5V/110mAh. The Bluetooth remote is compatible with IOS 7.0, Android 5.0 and above devices.

⭐ [Super Lightweight & Convenient to Carry Around] - Thanks to the hidden retractable design, it’s only 7.7 inches for folded size and extension max. 31.3 inches. You can put it in pockets or other small bags. Whenver you want to record a beautiful moment, it always be there.

⭐ [Simple to Use & Universal Fit] - Fast Bluetooth connection with your phone, you can easily use this hand holding selfie stick by pushing the shutter control button. You can use it for a close self-photography or extend it to get a larger scenery. What’s more, you will be using it as a desktop phone holder, doing live internet broadcast, binge-watching TV shows, etc. With a very flexible adjustable view height, the nape ache, shoulder pain will be substantially reduced.

⭐ [Portable Yet Extendable Design] - The selfie stick has a maximum extension length of 31.3 inches (approximately 80cm), making it compact yet versatile. It is crafted with aviation-grade aluminum alloy, ensuring a balance of lightweight portability and exceptional durability. Perfect for those who need a travel-friendly option without compromising on quality.

⭐ [Easy and Safe Tripod Setup Instructions] - To prevent damage during tripod setup, follow these steps: a) Hold the top of the phone holder and gently pull it outward to extend the stick slightly. b) Manually unfold the three legs of the tripod just a little bit - do not use excessive force to fully spread the legs at once. c) Gradually pull the telescopic pole upwards; as you do, the tripod legs will naturally open wider. This ensures a smooth and secure setup for stable use.
[FCC Radio Frequency Emission Compliance] - Radio Frequency Emission & Authorization Status: Product has an FCC ID. FCC ID: 2ASUP-ATSS055

ATUMTEK Selfie Stick adopts an integrated design, with the body made of aeronautical-grade aluminum and a surface processed with anodic technique. With the most portable, fashionable, and robust wireless Bluetooth selfie stick on the market, let's say goodbye to fragile and odorous plastic ones.

The built-in rechargeable Bluetooth remote ensures seamless control over your phone's camera, allowing you to capture moments effortlessly. Crafted with durable aluminum, the extended pole offers reliable support, while the secure grip of the phone holder keeps your device firmly in place. 
With the ATUMTEK Selfie Stick Tripod, you can confidently take photos and videos from any angle, making it a must-have accessory for every adventure and occasion.

breadCrumbs: Cell Phones & Accessories › Accessories › Photo & Video Accessories › Tripods
features: Unlimited 360° rotation：Gahenwo tripod can be rotated 360°, support top down, back up, horizontal and vertical screen rotation, free photo angle to meet your daily shooting needs. The cell phone holder can support phones with a width of 2.16in-3.46in (screen size of 4-7 inches), compatible with almost all cell phones. Built-in anti-slip pads to protect your phone from falling.

Portable All-in-1 Design：Unlike traditional phone tripod stand, Gahenwo Multi-Function Selfie Stick Tripod with Integrated Design, 8-section retractable pole and collapsible legs allow complete storage as a tube up to 11 inches (28cm) long. Beautiful and stylish while compact design is easy to carry without taking up space, is a good companion for outdoor travel.

Stable Tripod： The phone tripod utilizes the principle of triangular stability, while increasing the chassis force area, increasing the moment of force, When it is used as a tripod it can be very stable and not easy to shake. 1 button unlock tripod design, it does not require complicated assembly, just press the BUTTON button at the bottom to unlock the tripod easily. The tripod is equipped with anti-slip pads for greater stability when unfolded.

Selfie Stick Tripod with Remote：Equipped with a 50 mAh long-lasting rechargeable remote control, capable of 10-meter remote selfies with a simple connection. The remote control is embedded removable design, simple to take out, it can also be mounted on a tripod leg when it is not needed to prevent loss.

Stretchable and Comfortable：This Phone selfie stick is designed with an 8-section aluminum alloy telescopic pole, the longest can be stretched up to 60 inches so that you can freely adjust the height (length) to capture a wider view. Suitable for selfies, videos, live streaming, group photos and more.

productOverview.value: All-in-1, Telescopic, Lightweight, Remote Control, Adjustable angle

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
The cell phone tripod consists of eight sections of telescopic rods, which can be freely adjusted in height by gently pulling, very convenient and simple to use. The aluminum alloy makes it sturdy and corrosion-resistant, even in humid environments. 
Use as a cell phone tripod 

The legs of the tripod have been improved to increase the chassis force area and torque, which makes it very stable and not easy to shake when used as a tripod. 
Use as a phone selfie stick 

When used as a selfie stick, you just need to pull the cell phone clamp or handle, install the cell phone, adjust the angle and then you can use it. Simple operation, you can take a wide angle view without the help of others. 
Rechargeable Wireless Remote Control 

The wireless remote pairs instantly with your phone to take multiple photos within a 10-meter range, and it features a detachable design that can be placed in the groove of your travel tripod when not in use, making it easy to store while preventing loss. 
State-of-the-art Holder 

The clip of the cell phone holder can be rotated 360°, support top down and top up shooting, and also switch forward/backward 110 degrees, horizontal and vertical screen rotation, the photo angle is free, to meet your daily shooting needs. 
8-section aluminum alloy telescopic pole 

The cell phone selfie stick tripod features an 8-section adjustable telescopic pole with sufficient height, adjustable from 11 inches to 60 inches. Therefore, this selfie stick for iPhone can capture a wider landscape, meet people's needs for different shooting heights, suitable for different scenarios, even for tall people. Suitable for selfies, live streaming, group photos and more. 
Anti-slip pad design for extra stability 

The three-leg foot pads are made of silicone, which is non-slip and friction-resistant, so you don't have to worry about tipping over even if it is placed on a smooth surface. 
How to use of vertical screen 
Rotate the phone holder 90° towards the remote control side, and then rotate the phone holder to the front to complete the vertical screen operation. 
Note: 
Prohibited to force the holder down in the direction which it can only 20° tilt, otherwise it will be damaged.

title: NEEWER 74" Video Tripod with Adjustable Damping Fluid Head, Metal Heavy Duty Dual-Mode QR Plate Compatible with DJI RS Gimbals, Flexible 360° Pan&+90°/-75° Tilt, Max Load 22lb/10kg, TP75
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Tripods & Monopods › Complete Tripods
features: 【Professional Fluid Head Tripod】This top notch video tripod comes with fluid drag head that features built in dampening and balance design. The tripod head enables flexible camera movement: 360° pan & +90°/-75° tilt. Its 75mm diameter bowel shaped base and head locking handle allow the head to slightly move up and down to fit uneven ground, and the included bubble level helps keep the horizon straight. The detachable handle offers extra flexibility to operate

【Adjustable Pan/Tilt Fluid Drag】The professional fluid head is designed with two separate devices to control how much friction there is when panning or tilting the head. Use the side dampening knob to adjust the fluid drag of tilt movement, or rotate the bottom ring to change the fluid drag in pan axis, so as to allow smooth shots free of shake and vibration. Rotate them clockwise to increase dampening effect and rotate counterclockwise to decrease

【Quick and Easy Modes Switching】 The fluid head has two QR modes, compatible with DJI RS2 RS3 RS3 PRO gimbal. Compared to the traditional slide in structure, you can press the quick release plate directly from the top of the fluid head and lock it in 1s, as well as quickly release the plate via the side release button, more efficient and convenient to switch between tripod and gimbal shooting

【35"-74" Easy Tripod Height Adjustment】With 3 sections of telescopic tripod legs and quick flip locks, the tripod can be easily adjust in height from 35"/89cm to 74"/189cm. Its maximum load capacity reaches up to 22lb/10kg, capable of supporting DSLR cameras, camcorders, and many other devices, compatible with Sony Canon Nikon, etc. The shooting tripod head also has a 1/4" threaded screw hole to mount monitor, LED video light, magic arm, and other compatible devices

【Super Stable Camera Tripod】Each tripod leg consists of two connected aluminum alloy tubes for better stability. A spread lever in the middle helps keep the tripod legs in place. Equipped with anti slip rubber tripod pads, the tripod offers stable filming support on different types of ground

title: NEEWER 79"/200cm Video Tripod, Heavy Duty Aluminum Alloy Camera Tripod Stand with 360° Fluid Drag Head, QR Plate Compatible with Canon Nikon Sony and Other DSLR Camera Camcorder, Load Up to 17.6lb/8kg
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Tripods & Monopods › Complete Tripods
features: 【Sturdy Aluminum Alloy Tripod】 This aluminum alloy double tube tripod is sturdy and durable for use in different shooting environments. The 70mm bowl base located at the bottom of the tripod head can be adjusted to keep it stable on most surfaces, meeting the needs of outdoor travel shooting

【Adjustable Height & Easy to Carry】 The strong flip locks allow the user to conveniently and easily extend and secure the legs. Use this locking mechanism to adjust the height of the tripod from 34.6"/88cm to 78.7"/200cm. Fold the tripod down to 35.8"/91cm and store away in the included tripod bag for easy storage and transport
【Standard 1/4" & 3/8" Screws】The large quick release plate with 1/4" and 3/8" screw is compatible with Canon Nikon Sony and other DSLR cameras and camcorders
【Fluid Drag Head】 The fluid head pans 360° horizontally and tilts -70° to 90° vertically, giving you a perfect shooting angle and enhanced shooting experience

【Bubble Level & Non Slip Rubber Feet】 Built in bubble level ensures this tall tripod is well balanced and securely set up. The maximum load capacity of the tripod is 17.6lb/8kg and is equipped with rubber pads at the bottom of the feet to increase stability

NEEWER 79”/200cm Video Tripod, Heavy Duty Aluminum Alloy Camera Tripod Stand with 360°Fluid Drag Head, QR Plate Compatible with Canon Nikon Sony 
Made of aluminum alloy, this heavy-duty double-tube tripod is sturdy and durable making it well adapted for most photography conditions. 
The fluid head pans by 360° tilts at -70°- 90°. Obtain an optimal position for your camera with ease for the very best shots. 
The flip leg locks make it easy and fast to adjust the tripod height. 
The quick release plate has 1/4" and 3/8" screws for mounting a wide range of compatible devices.

title: SLIK Pro 700DX Tripod KIT with 3-Way Pan & Tilt Head, for Mirrorless/DSLR Sony Nikon Canon Fuji Cameras and More - Black (615-316)
inStockText: This item cannot be shipped to your selected delivery location. Please choose a different delivery location.      This item cannot be shipped to your selected delivery location. Please choose a different delivery location.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Tripods & Monopods › Complete Tripods
description: This black,SLIK Pro 700 DX Tripod with 700 DX 3-Way, Pan-and-Tilt Head supports up to 19.8 lb, measures 29.9"" when folded, and includes a quick release plate. Each of its 3-section legs features an independent spread, a 3-position angle lock, and flip locks for fast deployment. The included push-and-pull, rapid center column is multi-sectional, which allows it to be converted to a shortened center column. This feature permits a minimum height of 25.4"" or 16.1"" when the center column is shortened. The SLIK Pro 700 DX Tripod provides a maximum height of 60.0"", 65.8"" with its center column shortened as well as fully raised, and 75.0"" with the complete column fully raised. Cameras, sport optics, or camcorders that are compatible with a 1/4""-20 mount can be connected to the quick release plate, which is secured to the tripod's pan-and-tilt head using a quick release cam lock. The head can be rotated 360°, and tilted 90° backwards or forwards, as well as sideways for portrait orientation. Each of these three movements function independently of each other and can be locked into place. For added versatility, the center column is reversible, facilitating low-angle photography where an attached camera is positioned among the tripod's legs instead of above them. Foam covers on each of the legs provide a secure and comfortable grip while moving the tripod, and rubber feet help to enhance stability on a wide variety of surfaces. Use and Handling Supports up to 19.8 lb Push-and-pull center column for rapid camera, lens, or sport optic positioning Center column is multi-sectional, allowing it to be converted to a shortened center column that allows the tripod to be set at a minimum height of 25.4"", or 16.1"" when the column is shortened Tripod can be set to a maximum height of 60.0"", 65.8"" when the column is shortened as well as fully raised, and 75.0"" with the complete column fully raised Column is reversible, facilitating low-angle photography where an attached camera is positioned among the tripod's legs instead of above them Legs each feature three sections, an independent spread, a 3-position angle lock, and a flip lock for rapid deployment Legs can be locked at 16°, 40°, or 65° angles Foam covers on each of the legs provide a secure and comfortable grip Rubber feet for stability 3-way, pan-and-tilt head can be rotated 360°, and tilted 90° backwards or forwards, as well as sideways for portrait orientation Rotation, backwards and forwards tilt, as well as portrait orientation tilt each function independently of each other and can be locked into place Weighs 7.1 lb, measures 29.9"" when folded Construction Details Aluminum, magnesium, and titanium-alloy legs with cast-aluminum 3-way, pan-and-tilt head Quick release plate with 1/4""-20 mount with anti-slip, cork surface Center column platform for 3-way, pan-and-tilt head with reversible 1/4""-20 and 3/8""-16 mount Included carry bag features a zippered closure and handle for storage and transport of the tripod with 3-way, pan-and-tilt head

productOverview.value: Slik Pro 700DXQ AMT Tripod With 3-Way Pan and Tilt Head (Black)

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
AMT Alloy 
Slik’s exclusive A.M.T. alloy has a 40% greater strength to weight ratio than standard aluminum. The legs are lighter weight and stronger than standard metal. 
Maximum Height 
The PRO 700 series gets the camera to eye level without having to raise the center column. With the center column raised the tripod reaches over eye level to up to 76.8 inches depending on which head it used. 
Multi-angle legs locks 
The Rapid Flip Mechanism (RFM) adjustable angle leg locks can lock each leg independently at a different angle to make it easy to set up on uneven ground or steps. 
Flip locks 
The SLIK PRO 700 series makes setting up easy with secure flip lever leg locks that do not snap back at you when locking. One finger operation is all that is required. 
Available in three Convenient Options 
PRO 700 DX 
The most popular, the original PRO 700 DX comes with the heavy-duty, all aluminum 3-way pan head. This is one of the fasted and easiest to use quick release plates in the industry. SLIK made a circular quick release plate that makes attaching your camera more intuitive than other square or angled heads. Available in natural silver or black legs. 
PRO 700 BHX 
The PRO 700 BHX ball head uses the same circular quick release system as the PRO 700 DX tripod head. The Slik Ball Head SBH-808 has one of the fastest and easiest quick release plates in the industry while also having a separate pan lock so once the camera is leveled it can move horizontally for panoramic photography. 
Leg Only 
Equipped with a U1/4 20 and 3/8" thread adapter, the leg only option allows you to use almost any tripod head to mount your system. Available in either titanium or black and built with aluminum, magnesium and titanium alloy for a tough, durable, professional setup.

title: SelfieShow Selfie Stick, Extendable Selfie Stick Tripod with Wireless Remote and Tripod Stand, Portable, Lightweight, Compatible with iPhone 15 14 13 12 Pro Xs Max X 8Plus, Samsung Smartphone and More
breadCrumbs: Cell Phones & Accessories › Accessories › Photo & Video Accessories › Tripods
features: 【All in 1 Selfie Stick Tripod】: This is a nifty piece of kit, not only a selfie stick but can also be converted very easily into a phone stand, At the bottom end, you can release the three legs to get a tabletop tripod. In normal conditions on a flat surface, The shorter it is extended, the more stable it will be. A nice steady balanced tripod for convenience of hands free selfies and Facetime/video calling.

【Extendable & Foldable Selfie Stick】: The Selfie Stick thanks to the hidden retractable design, It is extremely compact when folded up, only 7.64 inches (19.4CM) 150g, very light to carry, Fits perfectly in a handbag ready to use whenever. But also can extend a long way (to 41.73 inches/106 cm including the handle), and let you capture selfies with a larger field of view, great for Selfies, Group Photos, Face-time, Life-Vlog, Video shooting, Social life, etc.

【Detachable Remote Control】: The selfie stick comes with a battery-powered button, The button clicks out of the handle with a little push, To switch on and make the unit visible to the phone via, it’s as simple as holding the remote button down for a few seconds and the selfie stick appears and is ready to connect, and once connected and open the phone camera app to use it to take a selfie.

【Adjustable Phone Holder】: The Phone clips to hold your phone are simple enough, you unfold the two little pads and extend the sprung end of the clip to hold your phone, very sturdy and grips your phone nice and tight. 245° rotation head allows you to find your favourite shooting angle by simply rotating the knob to meet different needs better.

【Widely Compatible and Warranty】: The width of the phone holder is between 6.5-9.5cm, Compatible with Most Smart Phone and Gopro in Market, such as iPhone 16/15/14/13/13 Pro/12/12 Mini/12 Pro/12 Pro Max/11/11 Pro/XR/X/8 Plus/Galaxy Note 20/S20/S10/S9/Google/OnePlus/Android Smartphone. SelfieShow team Service of items includes a one-year Warranty, 24 hour Online Best Service.

title: MACTREM Camera Tripod, 74 inch/187cm Aluminum Travel Tripod & Monopod with 360°Ball Head, Lightweight Tripod for Smartphone iPad Canon Nikon Sony Binoculars Laser Level Telescope
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Tripods & Monopods › Complete Tripods
features: 【Wide compatibility】Camera tripod with 1/4 inch screws for most cameras, DSLRs, projectors and binoculars, etc.; also comes with a free cell phone & tablet holder for small iPads and most cell phones on the market, such as iPhones, Huawei, Samsung, etc

【Lightweight and Portable】The lightweight tripod is made of high quality and lightweight aluminum alloy. It weighs 2.6 lbs (1.2 kg) and has a maximum weight capacity of 13 lbs (6 kg). Heavy duty tripod folds down to a compact size of 16.5 inches/42cm and fits easily into a carry bag. The travel tripod quickly converts to a monopod (16.5 in. to 74 in.) for an alternative way to shoot, or can be used as a mountaineering tripod during hiking trips

【360° Swivel Ball Head and Stability】The specially designed ball head swivels 360° to meet all your photographic needs. The precise 360° scale allows for precise image alignment and free angles, giving you perfect shots and stunning results. Stabilizing hooks for hanging extra weight and non-slip rubber feet designed for added stability

【Adjustable Height】Each legs of the tripod features 4-section column legs and 3 quick-release flip locks that provide the flexibility to adjust the working height from 16.5 inches to 74 inches in seconds. The tall tripod's leg angles are freely adjustable and lockable to suit the conditions of the shoot, allowing for a high level of shooting

【Macro Photography】You can also use the inverted center column for macro photography to get up close and personal. By rotating the knob system, you can elongate the center column to shoot any object at a lower angle. We provide 24 hours after-sales service, if you have any questions, please feel free to contact us

title: Eicaus Portable and Flexible Phone Tripod Stand for Cellphones, Compact Mini Tripod with Remote for Video Recording, Vlogging and Travel Photography(Black)
breadCrumbs: Cell Phones & Accessories › Accessories › Photo & Video Accessories › Tripods
features: Material Upgrade: The tripod legs are crafted from premium-grade metal with all-metal connectors, fortified with a protective layer of rubber coating and foam. Enhanced with non-slip rubber feet, this design ensures maximum stability on both tabletops and floors.

Lightweight and Compact: With its super flexible legs, this tripod offers effortless angle adjustments, enabling you to wrap it around railings or other objects for even more shooting possibilities. Plus, it easily straightens for compact storage and portability, making it perfect for travel, hiking, camping, and even as a selfie stick.

Multi-Angle Shooting: The phone clamp and tripod head have been upgraded to rotate 360 degrees, providing the convenience of vertical, horizontal, and high-angle modes for your phone without the need to remove it. Moreover, the 360° rotatable ball joint allows for smooth angle adjustments of your phone or camera.

Functional Accessories: The package features an enhanced phone clamp, accommodating phones up to 5.7 inches wide, coupled with a cold shoe mount for microphone and LED light. It also comes with a remote control, functional up to 30 feet, and compatible with most phones. The standard 1/4 thread allows use with most digital cameras, and we also offer a BC adapter that works with GoPro.

What You Get: This product includes a mobile phone tripod, remote control, phone clamp, GoPro adapter, and user manual. Our dedicated customer service team is available to assist you with any inquiries you may have. Note: If accessory missing, please contact us.

title: Manfrotto MTPIXIMII-B, PIXI Mini Tripod with Handgrip for Compact System Cameras, for DSLR, Mirrorless, Video, Made in Italy, Technopolymer and Aluminum, Black
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Tripods & Monopods › Complete Tripods
description: Take it with you. The Manfrotto PIXI is the mini tripod for compact system cameras (CSC). An ideal solution for photographers searching for a lightweight, portable and easy-to-use support system. The Manfrotto PIXI helps you to flawlessly capture challenging video shots that are steady and smooth. Use the Manfrotto PIXI with the legs closed to capture professional-looking videos that are sure to stand out. The push-button mechanism enables you to position and lock the ball head in one rapid, intuitive movement. Pushing the button releases the ball joint to move freely. When the button is released the ball is locked automatically in the selected position. The Manfrotto PIXI has a minimal Italian and is manufactured from stainless steel and adapto for a high quality finish. With it is solid construction, you are provided with a secure base for any shooting situation while the rubber feet guarantee a stable and slip-free foundation on any surface. Thanks to the universal ¼ Inch screw thread and excellent stability, you can use PIXI with a many different digital devices, weighing up to 1 kg.
features: VERSATILE: Close the legs to use it as a comfortable grip to capture videos that stand out from the crowd
DSLR COMPATIBLE: Thanks to the universal 1/4 Inch screw thread and stability, Pixi can be used with a variety of devices, including iPhones (with KLYP), compact cameras, CSC and entry level DSLRs
SAFE: When the button is released, the ball is locked automatically in the selected position
COMPACT: The ideal solution for photographers searching for a lightweight, portable and easy-to-use support system
FUN: Find new perspectives and new ways to capture your shots flawlessly, while being provided with a secure base for any shooting situation

variantDetails.name: Black Black Tripod Kit with Universal Smartphone Clamp, Made in Italy
Black PIXI Mini Made in Italy

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Let's welcome PIXI Made in Italy! 
Made in Italy culture for quality and design. In order to support the creative community to explore their imagination with the same standards of quality, innovation and design that are usually reserved for professional photography, Manfrotto interprets market evolution using a production culture that is quintessentially Made in Italy, in which quality, design and careful attention to detail combine with constant research and technological innovation. 
Same fun while creating content but definitely at another level of quality! 
No matter where you are or what kind of content you want to shoot, from home learning to vlogging PIXI Made in Italy has your back! 
The Manfrotto PIXI is a mini tripod for compact system cameras (CSC) and smartphone. 
An ideal solution for photographers searching for a lightweight, portable and easy-to-use support system. 
Videoconferencing has never been so easy 
Work and learn from home with ease and efficiency. Conference without interruption doubling up the support. 
No Boundaries with compactness & creativity! 
Compactness for any kind of shooting situation and new perspectives to capture your shots flawlessy. 
Camera streaming gear for real-time creativity! 
Livestreaming is a fun way to create content as your broadcast is in real-time. 
One PIXI to rule them all with the universal 1/4" thread! 
Thanks to the universal 1/4" Pixi can be used with smartphones, CSC and entry level DSLR’s. 
Your gear safer than ever: lock & unlock! 
When the button is released, the ball is locked automatically in the selected position. 
Compactness & Creativity 
Real-time streaming 
Universal 1/4" thread 
Safer than ever 
How do you use a PIXI? Connect your camera or your device with the ¼-20” thread. Spread the legs to use the PIXI as a table tripod. Don't need the tripod legs? Use it with the legs closed and as a hand grip to capture professional-looking videos that are sure to stand out. 
What is the push button on the ball head for? The push-button enables you to position and lock the ball head in one rapid, intuitive movement. Pushing the button releases the ball joint to move freely. When the button is released, the ball is locked automatically in the selected position. 
Can I use any device with the PIXI? Thanks to the universal ¼” and excellent stability, you can use the PIXI with many different digital devices, weighing up to 1 kg and in any shooting situation while the rubber feet works as a stable and slip-free foundation on any flat surface.

title: 74"-Camera-Tripod, Porfessional Aluminum Heavy Duty Tripod Stand for Mirrorless Camera/DSLR/Cell Phone/Camcorder, with Holder and Travel Bag
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Tripods & Monopods › Complete Tripods
features: 74-INCH LIGHTWEITHT TRIPOD - This is a lightweight tripod that can be adjusted in height from 20 to 74 inches, suitable for cameras and cell phones. It folds down to just 19 inches for easy portability, making it ideal for frequent changes in shooting locations and travel. Despite its weight of only 2.8 pounds, it can support weights of up to 8.8 pounds.

STABLE TRAVEL TRIPOD - This tripod is made of durable engineering plastic and lightweight aluminum alloy, offering strength without adding bulk. It remains stable in mild outdoor breezes (up to wind force 3) and has a hook at the base of the center column for adding weights, improving stability even against minor impacts.

360° ADJUSTMENT OF THE HEAD - The tripod head features horizontal and vertical rotation capabilities (controlled by tightening and loosening the handle), ensuring your camera or smartphone can be freely adjusted within a 360° range to align with your target. The Bubble Level Indicator at the base of the center column position helps you align your camera to the indicated horizontal position.

SMOOTH AS SILK ROTATION OF THE HEAD - This tripod has undergone multiple optimizations and upgrades, with each component meticulously crafted to reduce errors. As a result, the tripod head's joints rotate smoothly like silk, ensuring precise alignment without any focus loss when tracking. Compared to other tripods, its major advantage lies in the absence of any stiffness when adjusting the camera angles.

MULTIFUNCTIONAL TRIPOD - This tripod is versatile, compatible with various devices such as cameras, mirrorless cameras (CSC), ring lights, projectors, and smartphones. It's ideal for capturing photos and videos at events, parties, travel, hiking, sports events, and for shooting YouTube videos, vlogs, live streams, and online meetings.

features: Flexible & portable for travelling: The weight of the tripod including the head is only 1.29 kg, and the folded length of the tripod is only 390 mm, which makes travelling more convenient.

1. How to choose the height of the tripod? 
Choose a tripod that is suitable for your height. Tripod height=your height-15cm-camera height. If you have additional requirements, you can choose according to the actual situation. 
2. What is the difference between carbon fiber tripod and aluminum tripod? 
For the same size tripod,carbon fiber will weigh about 30% less than aluminum alloy, and its strength will be higher, and it will not rust. But the value is also higher. 
3.How to choose the tripod loading capacity? 
You can choose according to the weight of camera and lens, for example your equipment is 2kg, it is suggested to choose the tripod bearing above 4kg. 
4.What is the difference between the twist lock and the lever lock? 
The structure of the twist lock is simple, easy to replace parts, disassemble, clean and maintain. The lever lock opens faster and is easy to operate with one hand. 
5. Can other gimbal be installed? 
Yes, any gimbal with a 3/8-inch port on the bottom is compatible.

title: Selfie Stick Tripod, 40 in Retractable Tripod for iPhone with Wireless Remote Control & Light, Portable Phone Tripod for Photograph, Live Streaming, Video Recording, Compatible with All Cellphones
breadCrumbs: Cell Phones & Accessories › Accessories › Photo & Video Accessories › Selfie Sticks
features: [Tumbler that can be carried around]--The selfie stick adopts a hidden retractable design, which is very light and small when folded, so it is convenient to carry around. Pull out the pole to extend a certain distance, from 7.5 inches to 40 inches, providing you with different field of view shooting effects. It's not just a selfie stick, it also converts into a phone stand. The handle pulls away from the bottom to create a tripod that you can place on flat ground for extra stability.

[Record your every moment in all directions]--This tripod selfie stick is made of aluminum alloy and is very sturdy. The mobile phone holder adopts a 360° rota-table mobile phone clip and a 225° rota-table gimbals to help you quickly find the best shooting angle. When using it, just pull the support point and extend the spring end of the clip to fix your phone. There is also a switch on the side of the bracket to adjust the tension, which is fully prepared for your shooting.

[Wireless Remote Control Brings Infinite Convenience]--The selfie stick tripod with remote is very easy to use. When shooting, just press the button on the handle to take pictures easily. And this remote control is detachable Bluetooth, suitable for iOS and Android cellphones, the Bluetooth control distance can reach up to 33 feet, allowing you to take pictures by yourself or in groups by taking off the remote control.

[Two light senses illuminate your beauty]--The small white screen on the end of the selfie stick phone holder is the fill light. It has two modes, one is natural fill light, the other is intensity fill light, you can adjust it by pressing the dot button on the back according to your needs. Whether it is day or night, the selfie stick with light can give you the best natural beauty.

[Freeze your beautiful memories]--Portable selfie stick is a great addition to your life. You can record any moment you want to take pictures during class reunions, family reunions, travel, graduation ceremonies, etc. You can also record videos, shoot adventure records, and start live broadcasts, etc. At the same time, you can also give it to friends, colleagues, sisters, and classmates on birthdays, Valentine's Day and other holidays.

title: TONEOF 66" Automatic Tripod,Auto-Open Phone Tripod Stand with Magnetic Rechargable Remote,Selfie Stick Tripod 360° Vertical & Horizontal Rotatable,Stable Travel Tripod for iPhone/Android(Black)
breadCrumbs: Cell Phones & Accessories › Accessories › Photo & Video Accessories › Selfie Sticks
features: Automatic Pop Open : TONEOF innovative tripod for cell phone is designed with automatic pop opening.When the tripod stand hits the ground (or other flat surface) in a vertical drop, its three legs will pop open automatically.Compared with ordinary tripods,TONEOF auto tripod can be opened quickly and automatically when in use, no need to open the three legs manually, saving time and easy to use.

Maximum Height of 66" : Featuring a 10-section telescopic pole with a maximum height of 66"/168cm, this selfie stick tripod for phone can meet the shooting of a wider perspective and bring a different visual experience. The telescopic pole is made of aluminum alloy, which is wear-resistant, corrosion-resistant, and can be used normally in humid environments.

360° Dual-axis Rotation : The tripod phone mount is paired with two swivel shafts, the upper shaft can rotate 180° up and down and the lower shaft can rotate 180° left and right. Together, the two axes can support a 360° rotation angle. Whether it's taking a top shot, a back shot, or switching between horizontal and vertical screens, it can be easily realized, making it more convenient to take pictures.

Magnetic Remote & Antipinch Mount : The built-in rechargeable remote control is magnetically designed for quick removal and installation, and charges with charging cable. The selfie stick mount extends from 2.36"-3.66"/60mm-93mm and is compatible with most common 4-7" cell phones (foldable phones and tablets are not).With anti-pinch design, it is safer and easier to install and remove the phone.

Larger & More Stable Base : The cell phone tripod base adopts a stable triangular structure, each leg is 28cm/11" long, and the maximum span of the base is 41cm/16.14", which makes the tripod more stable. (Please note that the cellphone tripod should be placed on a flat surface.) The folding design of the selfie stick tripod with remote is very portable, you can put it in your backpack or suitcase and take it with you when you are traveling.

features: 360° Rotating Travel Tripod Mount: The newly phone mount can support 360° rotation horizontally and 110° rotation vertically, which can quickly switch the direction of the cell phone screen to meet the cell phone top shot, vertical shot and other angles for easy framing. title: 80“ DSLR-Camera-Tripod, Photography 360 Ball Head Professional Aluminum Tripod & Monopod with Carry Bag Compatible with Canon Nikon Binoculars Laser Telescope (Weight 3.35 Lbs, 15Lbs Load)
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Tripods & Monopods › Complete Tripods
features: 【 𝗜𝗠𝗣𝗢𝗥𝗧𝗔𝗡𝗧 𝗥𝗘𝗠𝗜𝗡𝗗𝗘𝗥】Tripod Model: TM265A. 1, This is a lightweight camera tripod with an optimal weight capacity range of 8.8 pounds (4kg). Please do not use it to support equipment exceeding 15 pounds (7kg). 2, Remove one leg of the tripod, unscrew the central column hook, and pull out the entire central column. They can be assembled into a monopod with a height exceeding 72 inches. For detailed instructions, please refer to the user manual. 3, The ball head sphere is made of aluminum alloy, and the fixed bowl of the ball head is constructed from high-strength engineering plastic.

【𝗨𝗣𝗚𝗥𝗔𝗗𝗘𝗗 𝗡𝗘𝗪 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗗𝗨𝗖𝗧】We have significantly improved the craftsmanship of this tripod stand: 1. The tripod components are crafted using CNC machining, resulting in minimal tolerances. As a result, adjusting the camera's angle on the ball head feels as smooth as silk. 2. We've optimized the ball head structure, removing unnecessary accessories to further reduce weight. 3. The load-bearing components are cast in a single piece and made from high-strength engineering plastic, ensuring exceptional durability and lightweight design.

【𝗦𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗗𝗬 𝗔𝗡𝗗 𝗖𝗢𝗡𝗩𝗘𝗡𝗜𝗘𝗡𝗧】The tripod weighs 3.35 pounds (1.5 kilograms) and has a maximum load capacity of 15 pounds (7 kilograms). Despite being a heavy-duty tripod, it is very lightweight. This tripod can fold down to a compact size of just 17.3 inches and easily fits into the included carrying bag. When needed, the tripod can quickly transform into a monopod (ranging from 34 inches to 80 inches) and can also serve as a hiking pole during your trekking adventures.

【𝗤𝗨𝗜𝗖𝗞 𝗔𝗗𝗝𝗨𝗦𝗧𝗠𝗘𝗡𝗧𝗦, 𝗖𝗔𝗣𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘 𝗧𝗛𝗘 𝗠𝗢𝗠𝗘𝗡𝗧】Each leg of this heavy-duty tripod features 4 extendable sections and 3 quick-release locks, allowing you to swiftly adjust the height from 24.6 to 80 inches in seconds. The tripod's leg angles are adjustable to meet your photography needs, and its maximum height eliminates the need to bend over while framing your shot.

【𝗠𝗨𝗟𝗧𝗜-𝗙𝗨𝗡𝗖𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡𝗔𝗟 𝗔𝗡𝗗 𝗩𝗘𝗥𝗦𝗔𝗧𝗜𝗟𝗘, 𝗘𝗫𝗣𝗔𝗡𝗗 𝗬𝗢𝗨𝗥 𝗣𝗛𝗢𝗧𝗢𝗚𝗥𝗔𝗣𝗛𝗬 𝗢𝗣𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡𝗦】The tripod has a minimum height of 24.6 inches and can also be used for macro photography by inverting the center column. Simply rotate the knob system to extend the center column for capturing a wider range of angles.

【𝗛𝗜𝗚𝗛 𝗖𝗢𝗠𝗣𝗔𝗧𝗜𝗕𝗜𝗟𝗜𝗧𝗬】The 1/4-inch quick-release screw is compatible with most cameras, DSLR cameras, mirrorless cameras, projectors, telescopes, and other devices. It can also be used to attach smartphones using the phone holder.

【𝗔𝗙𝗧𝗘𝗥-𝗦𝗔𝗟𝗘𝗦 】We offer a 3-year after-sales service, providing repairs and replacements for non-human damage. If you have any questions, our after-sales team will respond within 24 hours. Before use, please test to ensure the tripod's safety and reliability.

features: 【Innovated Mini Metal Desktop Tripod】 Achieve steady and shake free footage with the robust all metal tabletop tripod and ball head, featuring innovative cold shoe mounts and threaded holes for creative accessory expansion. It supports a maximum load capacity of 5.5lb/2.5kg, ensuring stability for compact camera vlogging or video recording, even for larger cameras. Non slip rubber feet provide a secure grip for stable shots

【Rotatable Cold Shoe Mounts】 Three built in cold shoe mounts on the pocket mobile tripod spider ring enable you to simultaneously attach multiple accessories such as LED lights, microphones, and phone holders. With a simple rotation of the spider ring, you can effortlessly reposition the attached accessories, elevating the versatility and adaptability of your accessory setup

【90° Tilting Ball Head for Vertical Shots】 Integrated with a metal ball head of the tripod and a dual U notch design for 360° panoramic and 90° vertical shooting in a flexible yet stable way, and ensures a quick, easy switch between portrait and landscape modes. The side locking knob fastens your device at any desired angle with a simple twist

【Diverse Mounting Options】 Comes with a top 1/4" screw that can be connected to DSLR cameras, camcorders, cellphone holders, and action camera adapters. Equipped with non slip pads to prevent scratches. Two extra 1/4" threaded holes on the ball head of the tripod and three cold shoes can attach magic arms, LED fill lights, microphones, etc.

【Portable & Versatile Uses】 Fully extend the three legs or combine them for a quick switch between a small table tripod and a single handed selfie stick. Simply rotate to adjust between three fixed angles (25° 55° 80°) and heights (8.9"/22.5cm, 7.3"/18.5cm, 4.9"/12.5cm), making it perfect for overhead and low angle/macro shots. Lightweight at just 10.2oz/290g, it's easy to fit in your bag or backpack, making it ideal for desk top photography, videography or filmmaking on the go
