features: Improved Tripod Stability: Crafted with high-quality aluminum alloy, it features thick non-slip rubber pads on its legs, ensuring enhanced stability during use. Whether you're capturing selfies, engaging in camera photography, live streaming, traveling, vlogging, pursuing fitness activities, or practicing dance, this versatile phone tripod serves as an ideal companion.

The 360° rotatable 3-way pan head with a convenient handle enables you to effortlessly capture broader views from any desired angle.

Universal Mobile Phone & Tablet Holder: Spring-loaded cell phone mount comes with your cellphone tripod is made of premium plastic and thicker rubber pads to grab your phone tightly. It accommodates cell phones and tablets with widths ranging from 2.56 to 8.66 inches.

Wireless Remote Shutter: Designed for both group shots and single full-body shots, our versatile video tripod comes with a small Bluetooth remote that eliminates the need for manual operation. Compatible with iOS and Android phones, the remote allows you to conveniently capture photos and videos from a distance of up to 33 ft/10 m. Its user-friendly design ensures easy connection and hassle-free use.

After-Sales Service: Our travel tripod kit includes a selfie tripod, a handy remote, a portable tripod bag, and a mount for phones and tablets. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us. You will get the help within 24 hours.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
ULTRAPRO 72" INCH CAMERA TRIPOD WITH SMARTPHONE MOUNT 
72 Inch tripod, fit most shooting scenes, like wedding, field scenery, news interviews, and others. It is a good choice for photography lovers. 
Tripod can be used for a long time still shooting, effectively preventing camera shake. After being disassembled into a monopod, it can still retain stability during the shooting. 
A lightweight and sturdy tripod, supplied with a fitted case and strap, it can be taken anywhere to gain maximum performance from your camera. 
ALUMINUM MATERIAL, COMPACT, & PORTABLE 
Made of aluminum, weighs only 4.49 pounds, small and lightweight to carry everywhere without burden. 
BUBBLE LEVEL 
A tripod bubble level is a leveling device used to show how straight a tripod is standing. Built-in bubble levels for accuracy, and a 3-way head allows for tilt, portrait, or landscape options. This helps to ensure your tripod is well balanced and makes the horizon lines in your photos appear straight. 
PAN HEAD HANDLE 
Moving the head about one of the axes is accomplished by “loosening” one of the arms with a twist, repositioning the head, and then re-tightening the arm. The advantages of the three-way head are precise movements about one axis and ease of use. 
ADJUSTABLE CENTRE COLUMN 
This is an upgraded feature on tripods and for good reason. The center column provides additional height to a tripod while adding relatively little weight, and it allows our beloved customers to quickly and accurately adjust the height of the camera. 
ADJUSTABLE LEG ANGLE 
Multi-section tripod legs will have a locking mechanism to prevent the legs from retracting when loaded or from extending farther. 
You can easily toss included carry bag over your shoulder, great for hiking or traveling. 
PERFECT FOR ALL CAMERAS 
The included phone mount automatically adjusts to hold any phone size. Perfect for iPhone 8, 8 Plus, X, 7, 7 Plus, 6, 6+, 5, 4, Samsung Galaxy S8, S8 Plus, S7, S7 Edge, S6, Note 7, or any other smartphone. The adjustable phone adapter fits all phones with a maximum stretch width of 3.4". 
This 72-Inch Photo and Video tripod feature a sturdy carrying handle as well as a comfortable foam grip. It has self-leveling rubber leg tips as well as built-in bubble levels, to assist with level shooting. It has a 3-way pan head and 3 section legs. It includes a deluxe carrying case for convenience. Lightweight, versatile, and affordable, the 72" tripod is a great tripod for users of any experience level. 
PROFESSIONAL FEATURES 
Take advantage of the bubble level to capture accurate images and fine-tune them according to your liking. The tripod’s Panhead handle lets you easily manage your videos smoother recording. 
ULTRAPRO CARRYING CASE 
We included a handy black carrying case so you can effortlessly travel and shoot anywhere you, please. Made of strong yet lightweight aluminum, the tripod transitions effortlessly from one spot to another and transports easily. 
ULTRAPRO MICROFIBER CLOTH 
Clean your product after every use with UltraPro Microfiber Cleaning Cloth. You can record important movements, guarding the beautiful movement anytime and anywhere. Please feel free to tell us if you have any problems with our products. UltraPro is behind you with the power you need to catch every moment. 
Convenience and Versatility for Easier Image Capturing 
Weighs less than 4 pounds
Legs can be adjusted individually from 28 inches up to 72 inches of height
Compact design allows ease of transport
Cellphone adapter holds phones up to 3.4” wide
Unfolds and adjusts in seconds
